Segment.name: AIN
Segment.comment: To provide type and amount of income obtained

Field.name: TypeOfIncomeCode
Field.comment: Code defining the nature or source of income

Field.name: FrequencyCode
Field.comment: Code indicating frequency or type of activities or actions being reported

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: TaxTreatmentCode
Field.comment: Code specifying whether a deduction should have pre- or post-tax status

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: IndustryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

SyntaxNote.name: P091011
SyntaxNote.comment: If either AIN09, AIN10 or AIN11 are present, then the others are required.
